title: JTAG debugging interface
extract: Joint Test Action Group (JTAG) is the common name used for a debugging, programming, and testing interface typically found on microcontrollers, ASICs, and FPGAs. ... This standard defines the Test Access Port (TAP) controller logic used in processors with JTAG interfaces.
extract_html: Joint Test Action Group (JTAG) is the common name used for a debugging, programming, and testing interface typically found on microcontrollers, ASICs, and FPGAs. ... This standard defines the Test Access Port (TAP) controller logic used in processors with JTAG interfaces.
